{"step_by_step_thinking": "During a Le-Fort 1 osteotomy, the maxilla is separated from the skull base and mobilized. The mid palatal split refers to the separation of the maxilla along the midline. To achieve this, the maxilla is moved in a specific direction. The mid palatal split is done by moving the maxilla in the transverse direction, which means from side to side.", "answer_choice": "D"}
